hero.title: QUALITY, USED HEAVY EQUIPMENT FOR SALE
hero.subtitle: Since 2004, Mideast Equipment Supply has been a reliable global partner for buying and selling heavy equipment. With trusted worldwide relationships, we deliver seamless transactions, expert support, and exceptional customer service.

support.title: support
support.subtitle: We Provide The Best Quality Construction Equipment And Excellent Support Service
support.description: Our mission is to provide honest, professional services to our customers in the heavy equipment industry. We take pride in our reputation as an ethical and reputable partner for contractors and dealers. We can help you buy or sell your heavy equipment — both locally and worldwide — through our global network of contacts. Our goal is your complete and total satisfaction.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Latest Equipment
products.description: Adhering to the recommended maintenance schedule of your machine is one of the most effective ways to ensure it stays performing at its best.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Industry Leader In Construction Equipment Supply

buy.title: Buy
buy.subtitle: We buy heavy equipment & trucks, one piece to 100+.

consignment.title: Consignment
consignment.subtitle: Can't come to agreement on a purchase, we can help. We sell equipment on consignment.

auctions.title: Auctions
auctions.subtitle: Our online auctions provide an effective alternative to sell your used heavy equipment.

eqLocators.title: EQ Locators
eqLocators.subtitle: With our vast network we can help locate any equipment not currenly in stock.

sell.title: SELL Inventory
sell.subtitle: Selling your used equipment is easy.
sell.getStarted: Get started selling your equipment with Mideast today!

stepDescriptions.step1: Provide basic information about your equipment
